The Islamic Plan to Destroy America from Within:
Brigitte Gabriel, a survivor of Islamic terror, who lost her native country of Lebanon to the hegemony of radical Islam and vows to make sure her adopted country of America never falls to the same fate.  There are few people who know more about the religion of Islam, its aims, its direction and its intended goals than Brigitte Gabriel. Seeing the religion of Islam firsthand, in the crunch, and I speak of the Lebanese War, Brigitte learned the hard way as to what this religion actually is.

This lady addresses possibly more governmental leaders and heads of state regarding this problem of Islam than anyone else.  You need to know and understand the threat to our nation and the entire world - possibly the greatest ever faced.
------------------------------------------------------------------------

Why We Are Afraid, A 1400 Year Secret:
What we never learn in history class: the REAL history as it happened. A history of Muslim theft, looting, slavery, brutality and savagery so extreme that it destroyed the entire classical civilization and all its accomplishments.  Dr Bill Warner has put together the timeline of events after meticulous study.

Learn the true history of Islam in Europe and how it effects us to this day. This is a history based on numbers and facts concealed from most history books and explains why we may be afraid to see Islam for what it is based on its own doctrine and practice.

Atomic Jihad - Islamic Revival and Obama's Politics of Defeat 2010:
Since its Islamic Revolution of 1979, Iran has been the undisputed leader of Islamism, the worldwide movement for Islamic revival. Islamism seeks to resurrect Muslim society from 300 years of decline by returning to its historic formula for success: Islamic law and government over Muslim lands. Iranian President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad has carefully laid out the Islamist view of the world for several years. He depicts a morally superior Muslim society based on Islamic concepts of justice, equality, and human dignity, while proclaiming America selfish, corrupt, hypocritical, and oppressive. Islamist animosity toward America also focuses on U.S. alliances with autocratic regimes in the Muslim world like Egypt, Jordan and Saudi Arabia as well as American support for Israel, "the illegitimate offspring of the Great Satan."

... "Marg-bar Amreeka (Death to America)!" Atomic Jihad leaves little doubt that Iran is in the final stages of preparing a Coming War for Islamic Revival. Meanwhile, by seeking to appease Ahmadinejad with "change" in U.S. Middle East policy, President Obama is ushering in the Politics of Defeat for America. If successful in its nuclear program, Iran and its allies will finally possess the means to achieve their ultimate goals - the defeat of America and the return of Islam to past glory.

Directed and Written by: Joel Gilbert
Running Time: 95 Minutes
A Highway 61 Entertainment Production
USA Release Date: Feb. 23, 2010
UK Release Date: April 4, 2010
